creator: ckruse@wwwtech.de
text:
mod_rewrite causes an endless loop on amd64 plattforms with regexes beginning 
with ^/? - the apache process handling the request will use 100% cpu. If you 
don't use the ? in the regex (^/ instead of ^/?), everything works fine.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 31858 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
